description.english: Defeat Loremaster Astaroth in the Tutorial Adventure.
Defeat Loremaster Astaroth and the Ice Devil Fizzarmelech at the same time in the Tutorial Adventure.
Save Warfell and Sadina from the Curse of Undeath in the Tutorial Adventure.
Start the module Augury of Chaos with four different parties.
Collect 100,000 gold coins in Augury of Chaos and collect all of the hidden gems in the wilderness around Finchbury in the same game.
Collect 500,000 gold coins in Augury of Chaos and collect all of the hidden gems in the wilderness around Finchbury in the same game.
Collect 1,000,000 gold coins in Augury of Chaos and collect all of the hidden gems in the wilderness around Finchbury in the same game.
Collect 2,000,000 gold coins in Augury of Chaos and collect all of the hidden gems in the wilderness around Finchbury in the same game.
Defeat the forces of Yanos in the Throne Room of Gleegold Keep in Ironman mode.

Defeat the forces of Yanos in the Throne Room of Gleegold Keep in Archmage mode without using any of the supporting options. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.
Defeat the forces of Yanos in the Throne Room of Gleegold Keep in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.
Defeat the forces of Yanos in the Throne Room of Gleegold Keep.
Fight and destroy the Greater Demon named Maphistor.
Fight the Archlich Xadriphar and use a powerful item to destroy it permanently.
Fight the Archlich Xadriphar in his tomb, at the Gate of Gleegold Keep and in the Throne Room all in the same game.
Deal with the Giant Spiders in the Mysterious Cave near Finchbury diplomatically both to release the boys and move through Giant Spider territory.
Slay the Giant Spiders in the Mysterious Cave near Finchbury.
Complete the transformation ritual with mages of all five schools of magic in Ironman mode in Augury of Chaos.
Complete the transformation ritual with a Wizard or Sorcerer in Ironman mode in Augury of Chaos.
Complete the transformation ritual with mages of all five schools of magic in Augury of Chaos.
Complete the transformation ritual with a Wizard or Sorcerer in Augury of Chaos.
Free the Genie called Lokkad from the enslavement of the enchanted lamp.
Create characters of all 22 Character Classes.
Save Dunwell from the Curse of Melianar at the inn of the Golden Griffon in Finchbury and pardon the Warlock Pizarra in the High Sewers in the same game.
Deliver Dunwell to Melianar's Babau at the inn of the Golden Griffon in Finchbury and administer justice to Pizarra in the High Sewers in the same game.
Recruit the Mantis Aquamancer named Zalapha.
Recruit the Drake Pyromancer named Sardabbras.
Defeat Zalapha, Sardabbras and the maximum number of Fire Elementals in the Mysterious Cave.
Rest near the river of lava in the Mysterious Cave and then defeat all of the monsters in the area.
Save all of the Blue Cloaks during the Goblin invasion of Finchbury.
Defeat all of the monsters during the Goblin invasion of Finchbury and recover the Artifact Warhammer Geodesis.
Defend the village during the Goblin invasion of Finchbury in Ironman mode.
Defend the village during the Goblin invasion of Finchbury in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.
Defend the village during the Goblin invasion of Finchbury.
Defeat the Sea Hags in the Red Cave near Finchbury in Ironman mode.
Defeat the Sea Hags in the Red Cave near Finchbury in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.
Defeat the Sea Hags in the Red Cave near Finchbury.
Defeat the group of Lizardman leader Assyrik in the Green Cave near Finchbury.
Defeat the group of Sharkman leader Scaddon in the Green Cave near Finchbury.
Defeat both the Sharkman Scaddon and the Lizardman Assyrik in the Green Cave near Finchbury.
Defeat Giant Spider Queen Sattram in the High Sewers in Ironman mode.
Defeat Giant Spider Queen Sattram in the High Sewers in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.
Defeat Giant Spider Queen Sattram in the High Sewers.
Create a +10 weapon or armour in Ironman mode in Augury of Chaos.
Create a +10 weapon in Augury of Chaos in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.
Create a +10 weapon in Augury of Chaos.
Start Augury of Chaos with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals and reach level 2 in Ironman mode.
Start Augury of Chaos with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals and reach level 5 in Ironman mode.
Start Augury of Chaos with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals and reach level 10 in Ironman mode.
Start Augury of Chaos with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals and reach level 15 in Ironman mode.
Start Augury of Chaos with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals and reach level 20 in Ironman mode.
Defeat the forces of Yanos and Pizarra in the Chapel of Chaos in Ironman mode.
Defeat the forces of Yanos and Pizarra in the Chapel of Chaos in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.
Defeat the forces of Yanos and Pizarra in the Chapel of Chaos.
Drink from the Pool of Raw Chaos in the Chapel of Chaos.
Defeat the three Lieutenants of Grand Master Yanos - Vikaras, Thogar and Pizarra - in the Chapel of Chaos in the same game. You must defeat Thogar and Pizarra in the same battle.
Defeat the Coven of the Four Crones in the Low Sewers in Ironman mode.
Defeat the Coven of the Four Crones in the Low Sewers in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.
Defeat the Coven of the Four Crones in the Low Sewers.
Defeat the group of Draggor, the Coven's Champion, in five rounds at the most in the Low Sewers.
Defeat the Coven of the Four Crones with the help of Greater Demon Maphistor.
Obtain level-9 magic scrolls from the Coven of the Four Crones.
Defeat the Green Goblin King named Tribulus in the Low Sewers in Ironman mode.
Defeat the Green Goblin King named Tribulus in the Low Sewers in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.
Defeat the Green Goblin King named Tribulus in the Low Sewers.
Defeat the forces of the Flaming Skull at the Gate of Gleegold Keep in Ironman mode.
Defeat the forces of the Flaming Skull at the Gate of Gleegold Keep in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.
Defeat the forces of the Flaming Skull at the Gate of Gleegold Keep.
Defeat the Red Dragon Barramthaghor in the Courtyard of Gleegold Keep without receiving aid from any allies.
Defeat the forces of Pizarra and the Ice Devil Fizzarmelech in the High Sewers in Ironman mode.
Defeat the forces of Pizarra and the Ice Devil Fizzarmelech in the High Sewers in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.
Defeat the forces of Pizarra and the Ice Devil Fizzarmelech in the High Sewers.
Call on the Angel named Lyrian in two crucial battles and keep her alive both times.
Create two copies of the Book of the Dead and give them to two interested creatures.
Defeat the Soul Sucker Mastermind in the High Sewers in Ironman mode.
Defeat the Soul Sucker Mastermind in the High Sewers in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.
Defeat the Soul Sucker Mastermind in the High Sewers.
Defeat the Efreeti called Scadulgon in the Low Sewers in four rounds at the most.
Free the prisoners of the Evil Eye Emperor in the High Sewers in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.
Defeat the Green Goblins or the Grey Goblins in the battle arena of the Low Sewers in Ironman mode.
Defeat the Green Goblins or the Grey Goblins in the battle arena of the Low Sewers in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.
Defeat the Green Goblins in the battle arena of the Low Sewers.
Defeat the Grey Goblins in the battle arena of the Low Sewers.
Defeat both the Grey Goblins and the Green Goblins in the battle arena of the Low Sewers.
Defeat the Lizardman King Largoss and the Great Hydra Hyatulob at the same time in the Low Sewers in Ironman mode.

Defeat the Lizardman King Largoss and the Great Hydra Hyatulob at the same time in the Low Sewers in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.
Defeat the Lizardman King Largoss and the Great Hydra Hyatulob at the same time in the Low Sewers.
Complete the three night-time quests in Finchbury in one go in Ironman mode.
Complete the three night-time quests in Finchbury in one go in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.
Complete the three night-time quests in Finchbury in one go.
Defeat the Sharkman Druid in the Water Shrine in Ironman mode.
Defeat the Sharkman Druid in the Water Shrine in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.
Defeat the Sharkman Druid in the Water Shrine.
Retrieve the buried treasure of the Sharkman Druid in the High Sewers.
Play Shingoro with Rothgar and win the final match at the inn of the Golden Griffon in Finchbury.
Call on the boys Garret and Perry in Finchbury two times in the same game.
Collect loot from the bandits in Finchbury two times, then defeat them and collect the reward.
Rescue both Erzimon and Asharzaelle and recruit them in the Low Sewers in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.
Have a group of Ratmen help you in recovering the Vanishing Sword in Finchbury and deal with the Ratmen peacefully in the Low Sewers in the same game.
Fight the ratmen both when looking for the Vanishing Sword and when exploring the Low Sewers in the same game.
